projects.title: Palate
projects.description: A full-stack MERN recipe generator that accepts text/image input and returns a complete recipe.

projects.title: ExpressInk
projects.pathLabel: Hackathon project for a good cause
projects.description: AI-powered tool analyzing children's emotions from their drawings. Supports autism-focused screening.

projects.title: Premier League Predictor
projects.description: Machine learning model to predict Premier League outcomes using historical data and statistical inference.

projects.title: Inventory360
projects.description: Secure inventory system for 1000 users across 12 sites with an interactive, user-friendly frontend. Utilizes MongoDB, Zod validation, and robust auth.

projects.title: Brick'd
projects.description: C# platformer with an inventive twist. Fun and polished. Released on Itch.io.

research.title: KV Cache Compression in Transformers
research.description: Exploring KV cache compression in transformers using mathematical tools like singular value decomposition (SVD) and dynamic rank adjustment. This work contributes to reducing memory usage during inference on large language models without significant loss in quality.
research.projectDescription: Chunk-wise SVD compression for transformer KV caches. Low memory usage, high accuracy on HPC GPUs using Dockerized environment.
